name: Diablo
notes:
- Original CD required.
- Use default options during the Windows setup. 
- Close the game with Alt+F4 if it launches automatically at the end.
- After installation, you can move  the "diabdat.mpq" file to the game's directory and play without the CD.
content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Diablo/Belzebub.exe
files:
- belzebub: https://lutris.net/files/games/diablo/belzebub-r1045.tar.gz
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Diablo
    file: belzebub
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/diabdat.mpq
